document_data.name: Othniir Xalast
document_data.mainbody: '''Othniir Xalast''' was a male human of the city of [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]]. He was a priest of [[Mask]] and a leader of the [[Grayclaws]] [[thieves]]' [[guild]] around [[1358 DR]].
